import React, {useEffect} from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const SingleRoom = () => { useEffect(() => { const hasReloaded = localStorage.getItem('hasReloaded'); if (!hasReloaded) { localStorage.setItem('hasReloaded', 'true'); window.scrollTo(0, 0); window.location.reload(); } // Clean up the local storage when the component unmounts return () => { localStorage.removeItem('hasReloaded'); }; }, []); return(
